*Kamodia is hit by one of Zardus' shots but jumps over the other one than
fires her Bazooka at Zardus twice*
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 25, 2000 11:06 PM
Subject: Battle at the Alliance Base


> Orchid, you got it all mixed up. Zardus is firing at Kambodia, not
Zergling.
> You said that you fired on Zergling in one of your posts, but Zergling is
not
> at the battlefield. Zardus is.
>
> ::Zardus/Hiss/Scavanger/DevilDuer::
>
> Zardus ducks easily under the rockets, looking Kamodia over. She wouldn't
be
> a challenge, he funally decides, jumping up into the air and firing at
her.
> From the corner of his eyes he sees Soundwave arrive. Zardus flies over to
> him, firing another shot at Kamodia.
>
> "We are a bit busy right now," he says, firing yet another shot, "Your
help
> would be greatly apreciated..."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Hiss turns quickly, Arcangel's blade slasing inches away from his chest.
> Reaching out to quickly grab the Maximal's arm, Hiss brings his knee up,
> attempting to break the arm.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Scavanger ducks under the missiles, flying back up in a spiral, trying to
> make himself hard to hit as he fires again from his rifle at Icedragon.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> DevilDuer's eyes widen as he sees the shots coming at him. He jumps to the
> right, the shots riddling his left leg. The Alliance member growls as he
hits
> the ground, rolling to his feet to fire a shot at Shocker from his pistol.
>
> 
>
>
>
